sentences.sContent: The Chancellor’s entrance was greeted with a standing ovation (= everyone stood up ).
sentences.sCn: 总理进来时，全体起立鼓掌欢迎。

sentences.sContent: Fans gave the rock group a thunderous ovation.
sentences.sCn: 歌迷对这个摇滚乐队报以雷鸣般的掌声。

phrases.pCn: 长时间起立鼓掌；起立致敬

trans.tranOther: if a group of people give someone an ovation, they clap to show approval
